alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 1:51PM MDT until August 12 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Southeastern Lawrence County in west central South Dakota... Western Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 230 PM MDT. * At 151 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Roubaix Lake, or 12 miles southeast of Lead, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Nemo around 200 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
